# Elemental Body II (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] ([[Polymorph Spells|polymorph]])

**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (the element you plan to assume)

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 276

This spell functions as *[[Elemental Body I (Spell)|elemental body I]]**,* except that it also allows you to assume the form of a Medium air, earth, fire, or water elemental. The abilities you gain depend upon the elemental.

*Air elemental*: As *[[Elemental Body I (Spell)|elemental body I]]* except that you gain a +4 size bonus to your Dexterity and a +3 natural armor bonus.

*Earth elemental*: As *[[Elemental Body I (Spell)|elemental body I]]* except that you gain a +4 size bonus to your Strength and a +5 natural armor bonus.

*Fire elemental*: As *[[Elemental Body I (Spell)|elemental body I]]* except that you gain a +4 size bonus to your Dexterity and a +3 natural armor bonus.

*Water elemental*: As *[[Elemental Body I (Spell)|elemental body I]]* except that you gain a +4 size bonus to your Constitution and a +5 natural armor bonus.
